umsebenzi we-trigonometric: Umsebenzi we-engeli evezwe njengesilinganiso sobude bezinhlangothi zikanxantathu ole kwesokudla
umsebenzi ophambene: Umsebenzi otholwe ngokuveza okuhlukile okuncikile komsebenzi owodwa njengokuhluka okuzimele komunye
i-cosecant: I-reciprocal of the sine function, echazwa njengesilinganiso se-hypotenuse kuya kolunye uhlangothi lukanxantathu ole kwesokudla.
i-cotangent: I-reciprocal of the tangent function, echazwa njengenani eliseduze nohlangothi oluphambene lukanxantathu ole kwesokudla.
ubunikazi be-trigonometric: Ukulingana okubandakanya imisebenzi ye-trigonometric okuyiqiniso kuwo wonke amanani okuguquguqukayo
umthetho wesines: Kunxantathu, isilinganiso sobude bohlangothi nesine ye-engeli ephambene siyashintshashintsha
umthetho we-cosines: Kunxantathu, isikwele sohlangothi silingana nesamba sezikwele zezinye izinhlangothi ezimbili kukhishwe kabili umkhiqizo walezi zinhlangothi ezimbili kanye ne-cosine ye-engeli efakiwe.
isilinganiso se-radian: Isilinganiso se-engeli ngama-radians, okuyisilinganiso sobude be-arc ukuya kububanzi bayo
ubude be-arc: Ibanga eliphakathi kwamaphoyinti amabili eduze kwesigaba sejika
umkhakha: Ingxenye yendilinga evalwe ngama-radii amabili kanye ne-arc yawo evalekile
isilinganiso se-trigonometric: Isilinganiso sobude bezinhlangothi ezimbili zikanxantathu ongakwesokudla
i-trigonometric equation: Isibalo esibandakanya umsebenzi owodwa noma eminingana ye-trigonometric yokuguquguquka
